entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:17 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
